A4.text: Currently, there are a total of 342 seats in the National Assembly.

A5.text: The National Assembly has 336 members, including 60 seats reserved for women and 10 for Non-Muslims, as per Article 51.

A6.text: The National Assembly of Pakistan is only allowed to have 336 total members of parliament or MNA.

A7.text: a single house, only a National Assembly that would consist of 300 members; 150 members from each East and West Pakistan
